title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4D.29 - Flashing Operation - Transition Into Flashing Mode
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4D.29 - Flashing Operation - Transition Into Flashing Mode

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Option: 03A Emergency changes from stop-and-go operation to
flashing operation (for example, when a display of conflicting green
indications is sensed by the control equipment) may occur at any
time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
4D.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
